messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Ok, I started it! (was re:Unschooling Podcast?)
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks!  I really appreciate the encouragement!  I will definitely keep it up :) ~Q~ aka Sarah http://www.unbridledlearning.com ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Thanks! I really appreciate the encouragement! I will definitely keep it
up :)

~Q~
aka Sarah
http://www.unbridledlearning.com

-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of aplan4life
Sent: Sunday, April 30, 2006 10:59 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Ok, I started it! (was re:Unschooling
Podcast?)

You did an awesome job! When you read Deb and Sandra's comments, the
way in which you spoke those words stung my very being and tears
flooded my eyes. Once you started rolling you sounded totally relaxed.

Excellent, very excellent.

~Sandy Winn
http://relaxedhomeschool.blogspot.com

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Queana" <queana7@...> wrote:
>
> I made a first edition of the new podcast! It was pretty easy once
I got to
> the recording part of it.
>
>
>
> Please have a listen, and send feedback or suggestions for next time to
> unbridledlearning@... Also, if you think it is worthwhile, please
> feel free to let others know (I am only on so many lists ;)
>
> You can get to the show from my site listed in my signature, or go
directly
> there at http://unbridledlearning.podomatic.com
> <http://unbridledlearning.podomatic.com/> Once you are there, click on
> download to get the audio file. I am working on getting listed in
itunes as
> well.
>
> If there is interest, I will make more. I already have a couple posts I
> like for the next one.
>
> Thanks for the feedback so far :-)
>
>
>
> ~Q~
>
> aka Sarah
>
> http://www.unbridledlearning.com
>
>
>

messages.msgSnippet: It was great!  Wow - I didn t even know that could be done.  I really enjoyed it.  You may have a future radio show in the works! Maisha
messages.messageBody:
It was great! Wow - I didn't even know that could be done. I really enjoyed it. You may have a future radio show in the works!

Maisha

"Don't be afraid of showing affection. Be warm and tender, thoughtful and affectionate. Mankind is more helped by sympathy than by service. Love is more than money, and a kind word will give more pleasure than a present."
~ Jean Baptiste Lacordaire

messages.subject: Ok, I started it! (was re:Unschooling Podcast?)
messages.msgSnippet: I made a first edition of the new podcast!  It was pretty easy once I got to the recording part of it. Please have a listen, and send feedback or suggestions
messages.messageBody:
I made a first edition of the new podcast! It was pretty easy once I got to
the recording part of it.



Please have a listen, and send feedback or suggestions for next time to
unbridledlearning@... Also, if you think it is worthwhile, please
feel free to let others know (I am only on so many lists ;)

You can get to the show from my site listed in my signature, or go directly
there at http://unbridledlearning.podomatic.com
<http://unbridledlearning.podomatic.com/> Once you are there, click on
download to get the audio file. I am working on getting listed in itunes as
well.

If there is interest, I will make more. I already have a couple posts I
like for the next one.

Thanks for the feedback so far :-)



~Q~

aka Sarah

http://www.unbridledlearning.com
